summary:
This mod will add 2 light armours sets from The Witcher 2.
You will find:

The Heavy Elven Armor Set And
The Witcher's Elven Armor Set.

The Heavy and the Witcher's armours set are craftable, temperable, enchantable (not tested atm).
You will need some leather, some leather strips, [...]
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/67990-0-1464996565.png[/img]
This mod will add 2 light armours sets from The Witcher 2.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]You will find:

[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]The Heavy Elven Armor Set And
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]The Witcher's Elven Armor Set.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]The Heavy and the Witcher's armours set are craftable, temperable, enchantable (not tested atm).
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]You will need some leather, some leather strips, and some iron ingot(s).
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]No perk needed.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]No DLC needed.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]Medium armor stats.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]For a mid-game char.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]For male.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]Not tested on a female char/nor on all the races atm.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]You will find:
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]1 Hood,
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]2 Armors,
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]1 Gauntlet(s),
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]2 Boots,
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]1 Greatsword (OP/Bonus).
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]Sorry for my English.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]Thanks, Setvi.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]Here are all the mod authors.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]All I've done is to make this one standalone.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/67990-1-1464996565.png[/img]
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]The Witcher
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]CDPR
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]AlphaWolf
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]Talyn82 *
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]Lice23
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]LordOfWar.
[/color][/font][/i][/b][/size][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3](Thanks for the permission) *[/size][/color][/font][/i][/b][size=3][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef]
[/color][/font][/i][/b][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/67990-2-1464996565.png[/img]
[/color][/font][/i][/b][/size][b][i][font=Verdana][color=#efefef][size=3]and10m
Clac
CRZhorse
rsagris
